name: Language-robox
tagline: Adds syntax highlighting and snippets to R3 (robox motion controller programming language) files in Atom.
body:
### language-robox
This is a package to add R3 support (the programming language for the family of Robox motion controllers) in [Atom](http://atom.io)

### Write your grammar

Here is a list of useful links that helped me in the development of this package.
- [TextMate Grammars Docs](https://manual.macromates.com/en/language_grammars)
- [Atom Syntax Highlightning tutorial](http://blog.gaku.net/create-a-custom-syntax-highlighting-with-atom-editor/)
- [TextMate Bundle Tutorial](http://www.apeth.com/nonblog/stories/textmatebundle.html)
- [Regex modifiers](http://www.regular-expressions.info/modifiers.html)
- [Oniguruma Regex Flavor](https://manual.macromates.com/en/regular_expressions)
- [Provider-API](https://github.com/atom/autocomplete-plus/wiki/Provider-API)
- [foldingStopMarker e foldingStartMarker in grammar (atom ignore this, unlike TextMate)](https://github.com/alefragnani/language-pascal/issues/10)
- [Atom api](https://atom.io/docs/api/v1.1.0/Config)
- [Choose a license](http://choosealicense.com/)
- [BinPress license generator](http://www.binpress.com/license/generator)
- [reason for single line patterns](http://ticket.macromates.com/show?ticket_id=E1489EDF)
- [bundling stylesheet in language package](https://discuss.atom.io/t/bundling-stylesheets-in-language-package/1956/2)

Example grammars:
- [Python Grammar](https://github.com/atom/language-python/blob/master/grammars/python.cson)
- [TypeScript grammar](https://github.com/TypeStrong/atom-typescript/blob/master/grammars/typescript.cson)

Useful tools:
- [Rubular](http://www.rubular.com/)
- [regular expressions 101](https://regex101.com/#python)

### Authors and Contributors
Created by Federico Ruggiero (@fruggiero)
